plot: Four women, side by side, are filmed in black & white 16mm at close range by a hand held 16mm camera. As they improvise to the Blues via an ancient dance form they summon the camera as a muse, following none but themselves.
title: Alchemy of the Oracles
plot_es: Four women, side by side, are filmed in black & white 16mm at close range by a hand held 16mm camera. As they improvise to the Blues via an ancient dance form they summon the camera as a muse, following none but themselves.
plot_en: Four women, side by side, are filmed in black & white 16mm at close range by a hand held 16mm camera. As they improvise to the Blues via an ancient dance form they summon the camera as a muse, following none but themselves.
